description.value:
A Large machine useful for decoding ciphers or strange writings. A User in possession of one counts Ciphers, Literacy, Scholastic Lore (Cryptography), Secret Tongue, Speak Language, and Trade (Cryptographer) Skills as Basic Skills, and may use Tech-Use Skill in place of any of them if using this item, although it takes twice as long.

Requirements

Doesn't need to be on the character's person, Merely needs to be able to be accessed readily (such as it being housed on the Character's vessel).

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
